sentences.sContent: She was very old and barely able to walk.
sentences.sCn: 她年纪非常大，只能勉强走几步路。

sentences.sContent: Nowadays, the village has barely 100 inhabitants.
sentences.sCn: 如今这个村庄只有100个居民。

sentences.sContent: ...But contact time at university has barely risen at all...
...There was barely any relationship between more spending and a bigger victory...
...and employs barely 9% of the nation's workers...

synos.tran: 仅仅，勉强；几乎不；公开地；贫乏地

trans.tranOther: only with great difficulty or effort
